title: Adriatic Metals launches equity raise, seeks London listing
text:
United Kingdom-based minerals explorer Adriatic Metals is seeking to raise $20 million via a two-tranche institutional placement to fund exploration and development of its Vares Project.

Canaccord Genuity, through its United States affiliation, and Tamesis Partners LLP are overseeing the deal, according to terms sent to fund managers.

Sprott Capital Partners LP and Ashanti Capital are co-managers.

Adriatic Metals said on Monday that it planned to pursue an LSE listing and was also seeking to raise $20 million. Tamara Voninski

The $1 offer price reflects an 8.3 per cent discount to the last close, a 10.2 per cent discount to the five-day volume weighted average price, and a 10 per cent discount to the 10-day volume weighted average price.

The brokers were calling for bids for offshore and local investors to be submitted by 8am Tuesday and said the deal had the ability to take oversubscriptions of up to an additional $5 million.
description: UK-based minerals explorer Adriatic Metals is seeking to raise $20 million via an institutional placement.
